item.title: underscore学习
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: ##集合 Note: Collection functions work on arrays, objects, and array-like objects such as arguments, NodeList and similar. But it works by duck-typing, so avoid passing objects with a numeric length property. It's also good to note that an each loop cannot be broken out of — to break, use _.find instead. ###遍历 each map pluck invoke ###查找 find where
